name: Notifyr
tagline: A Firefox add-on which notifies you of new mail via a toast-like notification.
body:
### Welcome

**notifyr** is a Firefox add-on which notifies you of new mail via a toast-like notification.

### Installation

1. Download [notifyr.xpi](url) and drag-and-drop it into your Firefox window
2. Follow the on-screen instructions to install **notifyr**

### Help and support

Just raise an issue at the [Issues](/issues) page and we'll be happy to help you!
